sentences.en: Dainty sauces are the life, the nobility of famous dishes.
sentences.cn: 美味的调料给上等佳肴以生命和华贵.

sentences.en: Everything was now fresh, dainty, and smelled of flowers.
sentences.cn: 一切都清新 、 雅致, 而且闻得出花香.

sentences.en: Her dainty rose - leaf lips curled in pretty disdain.
sentences.cn: 她那可爱的蔷薇叶的嘴唇瞧不起地朝上动了一下.

sentences.en: I am not dainty about my food.
It featured a solo dance in which a woman in a short overall mimed a lot of dainty housework.
sentences.cn: 它的亮点是一段独舞，一名身穿短罩衫的女子以哑剧形式优雅地表演了许多做家务的动作。

sentences.en: Our kitten is a dainty eater.
sentences.cn: 我家那只小猫吃东西很挑剔.

sentences.en: She is dainty about her eating.
The girls were dainty and feminine.
The little girl wore a dainty dress.
sentences.cn: 小姑娘穿着一件漂亮的连衣裙.

sentences.en: The quail were walking around like pullets, seeming all dainty and unseen.
sentences.cn: 雏鸡似的鹌鹑在周围漫步,一副旁若无人的神气, 十分娇美.

sentences.en: The violet is a dainty spring flower.
What had happened to his dainty English consonants ? They would not come.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么,他那很 顺口 的英语辅音怎么也发不出来.

words.tran_cn: 讲究地；优美地；难以取悦地；可口地

trans.tran_cn: 精致的，娇俏的，（指人）品位高雅的，难以取悦的

trans.tran_en: something small that is good to eat, especially something sweet such as a cake
